Articles.Content: Okay, this is the single most epic HypeTrain.
512! Incoming!
I'm trying to guees my post: 5067
50k views since I started paying attention to view count.

> 
> everyone stop. Honour the forum gods we have reached 502

pah!!!! Onwards!!!
89 pages until we DOUBLE the previous Hype Train...

> 
> About 40 mins between 400 and 500!!

I am disappoint with this post rate. GO GO GO~

> 
> We choose to double the previous record, not because it is easy, but BECAUSE IT IS HYPE!!

Exactly.
So what know?

> 
> this thread is growing faster than I can read it. I am posting a message for myself here, and I want to know where in the future I will encounter it. Im at the page 479 atm.

I'm way back at 310 I think. or here. I'm lost.

> 
> I'm trying to guees my post: 5067

5053 unfortunately~
Biggest hypetrain ever!
![maxresdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-70-nYsoHL0/maxresdefault.jpg)

> 
> 89 pages until we DOUBLE the previous Hype Train...

Triple, we must triple.
You doomed us all! We missed the 502 page! We were supposed to end it there but now we disrespected the forum gods! WE'RE DOOMED! DOOOOOOOOOOooooomed

> 
> About 40 mins between 400 and 500!!

Let's go for 600 in 30 mins
Harv is BACK ONLINE

> 
> I am disappoint with this post rate. GO GO GO~

It can be improved, but it's ok as a starter record-breaker.

> 
> You doomed us all! We missed the 502 page! We were supposed to end it there but now we disrespected the forum gods! WE'RE DOOMED! DOOOOOOOOOOooooomed

I tried to stop them i did
The hype thread is going by sheer momentum alone!

Hey, squad?

**sudo release 1.0**
Go for 600!
You can't stop this train, apparently.

Thomas is the hype train now.

![Thomas-the-Tank-En_2773439b.jpg](http://i.telegraph.co.uk/multimedia/archive/02773/Thomas-the-Tank-En_2773439b.jpg)

> 
> Let's go for 600 in 30 mins

Thats pushin it
